subtitles:
184476 187145 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
187228 190315 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

191149 193818 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
208041 210543 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

219010 221846 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

221930 225767 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

225850 231106 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

231189 234651 - lnfected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

243243 246413 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

248540 252836 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
252919 254504 We'll get you out of here.

254587 259259 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
276609 278737 Get it off! Get it off!

282365 285577 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

294252 297464 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1003128 1006006 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1014139 1016725 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1045378 1047630 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1077619 1082374 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1084542 1089756 The man goes to leave and the barman says
''Oi! You can't leave that lying there.''
1089839 1093885 He says ''No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe''.
1104479 1107399 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1114197 1117701 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1122288 1128712 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1128795 1132549 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1158116 1164372 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1164456 1168626 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1169502 1172255 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1172339 1177052 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1180930 1183767 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1186394 1188897 There was something in the blood.

1190357 1195320 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1202452 1205163 And that's when the exodus started.

1209376 1213046 there were reports of lnfection
in Paris and New York.
1215423 1218343 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1221304 1224265 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1226893 1230980 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1231064 1235360 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1236820 1239906 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1240532 1244703 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1263096 1267100 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1267183 1269769 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1284534 1288955 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1291458 1295545 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1299716 1303303 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1317984 1321154 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1485527 1489489 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1495954 1500458 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1503086 1508425 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1509050 1511428 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1511511 1514848 even though cash was completely useless.
1516391 1519519 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1525066 1527402 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1529571 1531906 I remember the ground was soft.

1533867 1538246 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1538329 1542292 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1542375 1546338 Somewhere in the crowd
there were lnfected. It spread fast.

1546421 1549758 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1551384 1554471 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1554554 1556931 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1559225 1564189 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1564272 1568151 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1582248 1587420 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1590090 1592926 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1593009 1596346 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1699032 1701326 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1710210 1712295 I'll start working on them, then.

1745745 1748707 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1748790 1751001 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1754254 1757173 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1795045 1797130 Do you have any clothes here?

1800216 1803887 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1803970 1807640 More lnfected will be coming.
They always do.

1836419 1839422 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1839506 1843426 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1843510 1848890 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1848973 1853395 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1853478 1858608 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1858692 1864114 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1864197 1868410 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1868493 1872956 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1875625 1878211 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1936936 1940065 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1940148 1943234 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1961169 1963254 Now I do need a break.

1983024 1988321 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1989531 1993785 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1996079 1998331 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1998415 2003503 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2009217 2012262 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2089631 2092634 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2092717 2095011 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2128420 2131506 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2146771 2149065 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2149149 2152193 Why don't you all sit down and...
2152277 2155238 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2155321 2157824 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2168793 2171796 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2171880 2174758 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2197530 2200617 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2229437 2235026 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2236695 2238947 You'll have to use the bucket.
2245495 2248123 Have to empty it each morning.

2248206 2251876 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2253753 2256881 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2270228 2272605 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2309309 2313021 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2314147 2316983 Probably need us more than we need them.

2328286 2332957 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2333041 2336795 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2341257 2344803 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2360860 2364114 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2365990 2369994 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2402193 2404279 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2404362 2408491 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2408575 2411786 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2428261 2432515 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2432599 2436353 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2452410 2455538 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2464464 2468218 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2468301 2472889 Salvation is here.
The answer to lnfection is here.
2472972 2475975 if you can hear this, you're not alone.

2476059 2480563 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2480647 2482857 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2486319 2490907 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2494494 2498415 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.

2498498 2500875 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2500959 2503878 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2507632 2512429 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2518309 2524399 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2524482 2527652 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2527736 2530238 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2530321 2534284 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2536161 2540457 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2540540 2544044 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to lnfection...

2544127 2548423 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2548506 2551343 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2551426 2555513 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2559976 2565690 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2569152 2574449 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2575158 2577243 So we have to try and get there.

2591383 2595136 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2623707 2626710 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2626793 2632048 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2649649 2652152 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2653028 2656406 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2656489 2660869 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2660952 2663872 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2699532 2701951 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2702035 2705372 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2707874 2710043 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2724641 2728186 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2760176 2764472 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2764556 2767809 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2774274 2779404 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2790290 2793209 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2806598 2809059 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2885552 2889139 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2889222 2891057 I think you can eat that raw.

2898732 2903236 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2907949 2911578 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2919669 2922922 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2977811 2980897 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3033116 3035785 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3133925 3136720 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3212671 3215674 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3216508 3219302 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3280613 3284325 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3284409 3288580 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3289622 3293460 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3297964 3301217 Um.... that's what you were thinking.
3304429 3306723 I was thinking I was wrong.

3318151 3322655 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3324032 3327494 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3330163 3333792 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3337420 3339923 See, that's what I was thinking.

3357691 3361695 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3390015 3392684 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3409492 3413371 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3413455 3417751 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3420462 3423048 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3423131 3426843 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3426926 3429179 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3441649 3444361 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3445445 3449449 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3526359 3529154 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3584459 3587962 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3588046 3593051 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3617617 3622122 Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3629587 3632632 The answer to lnfection is here.
3668960 3672339 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3674174 3676509 No fire crews to put it out.

3807474 3811478 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3811561 3814689 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3821529 3826368 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3942776 3945695 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3945779 3948281 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4011511 4014180 Three survivors. One male, two female.
4014264 4017600 I repeat, one male, two female.

4082415 4087295 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4087379 4089798 So you can all have a shower.
4089881 4093218 You look like you need one. Please.

4113154 4118368 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
4127168 4130338 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

4142642 4146229 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4150066 4155071 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4155155 4159075 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4160368 4162787 I want her to be OK.
4164372 4166541 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4166624 4169419 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4209542 4213046 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4213129 4219260 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4221680 4225850 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to lnfection.

4230355 4234859 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4235235 4238154 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4238238 4241366 The fire drove hundreds of lnfected
out of Manchester.
4241449 4244536 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4254587 4260468 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4264180 4268435 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4268518 4273189 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4276443 4281364 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4281448 4283867 The belly of the house. The heart.

4283950 4289205 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4291458 4293585 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4293668 4296880 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4296963 4301009 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4303553 4306556 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4330955 4336044 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4343718 4347764 The idea was to learn something
about lnfection.
4370453 4373873 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4385510 4390890 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the lnfected take to starve to death.
4430638 4433099 You'll have to wait and see
4435518 4438104 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4454496 4457874 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4465465 4467926 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4468009 4471221 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4471304 4474432 but this omelette will do just as well.

4489989 4493910 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4493993 4497414 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4504379 4507173 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4508008 4513471 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4513555 4518101 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4518184 4521438 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4521521 4524357 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4524441 4528486 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4528570 4532907 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4532991 4536119 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4538204 4542334 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4543084 4545545 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4546546 4548840 that is a return to normality.

4552844 4555847 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4555930 4559184 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4562062 4567275 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4570070 4574199 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since lnfection.

4576993 4581539 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
lnfection, the four weeks before that...

4581623 4587087 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4587170 4590799 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4599099 4602060 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4605021 4608274 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4609192 4612320 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4616408 4618451 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4670253 4673882 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4690565 4692859 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4715507 4721137 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4721221 4723431 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4725225 4730522 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4732148 4734317 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4740532 4745036 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4752752 4755797 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4755880 4759342 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4769811 4772522 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4775400 4777986 The rest of you, go with him.

4800383 4804596 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4804679 4806222 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4806306 4811478 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4818735 4821863 I killed... I killed a boy.

4833500 4838296 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4859275 4863071 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4864239 4868952 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4869035 4871913 What could I say to him?

4871996 4877210 We fight off the lnfected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4878128 4881965 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4882048 4888179 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4905739 4907532 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4907615 4909701 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4915832 4917792 We get in the car and we go!

4919169 4923715 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4923798 4927052 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4927135 4929846 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4943777 4946112 I want to give you a chance.
4949949 4952243 But I can't let them go.

4980313 4983066 Smithers says
''Women and semen don't mix.''

4983149 4986069 And Mr Burns says
''We all know what you think, Smithers. ''

4986152 4989072 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4989155 4992784 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4992867 4997288 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4997372 5000667 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5000750 5006464 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5007507 5011553 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5012929 5016057 Just imagine, just think about it.
5017100 5019394 How could lnfection cross the oceans?

5019477 5023773 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5023857 5026568 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5026651 5030655 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5034951 5038538 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5047297 5051676 ''There is no lnfection.
It's just people killing people.'' He's insane!

5098223 5101351 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5102435 5107565 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5107649 5111569 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5115407 5117492 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5142475 5145895 Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
5145979 5148481 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5148565 5151609 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

5154446 5157490 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5157574 5159492 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5159576 5163038 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5172339 5176301 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5176384 5180555 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5181806 5184642 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5187145 5190357 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5200116 5202035 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5217509 5220970 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5260010 5263972 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5264055 5267642 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5267726 5270270 which she certainly has no use for.
5271271 5273106 You can't do it to Hannah.

5273189 5276901 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5290415 5293209 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5293293 5296629 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5315398 5319527 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5321404 5325116 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5325200 5329371 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5353144 5356022 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5379087 5383049 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5383133 5385301 Are you trying to kill me?
5387721 5390265 I'm making you not care. OK?
5402235 5404904 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5410744 5413329 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5643393 5645854 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5646896 5650859 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5653611 5656239 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5669419 5671921 I think they're having an effect.

5687479 5690357 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5691107 5694194 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5694277 5696279 Is that the way it works?

5699824 5703912 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5722847 5725975 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5726059 5728895 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5750959 5756506 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5764472 5767851 Don'tjust stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5790290 5793251 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5819819 5823573 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6002293 6006673 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

6070070 6074866 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6074949 6079412 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6079496 6081831 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6146187 6148690 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6162954 6166499 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6172255 6174758 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6174841 6178178 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6186686 6190273 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6190357 6192442 But I thought he was biting you.
6192525 6195195 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6195278 6197447 - It's a long story.{148592}{148643}We have to get out of here. Come on!
6297964 6300383 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6394102 6396771 You looked all right in this, you know.

6418418 6421755 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6477227 6480146 Do you think he saw us this time?
